message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CY 

The paper discusses the use of contextual bandits in improving business metrics for a customer support bot, which involves natural language processing and information retrieval. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories, including cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.CY (Computers and Society). However, given the focus on reinforcement learning and practical solutions to challenges encountered in similar applications, cs.LG and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories.
